doc.field: Interview with Caroline Moore of Derry City. Conducted by Mr. Kevin Harris, Attorney at Law. Merriam, Kansas. Includes note: Dear Frank: We are sending you this taped interview of Caroline Mooore who describes life in Northern Ireland Under the pressures of the security forces. We hope that it will be useful to you in your review of the police services. Your truly, Andy Somers" Irish American Unity Conference, National Office, DC
